messages.subject: Re: Christie's Compton auction catalog
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Milt!  Sorry I won t see you this show but enjoy yourself.  Sedation cont. ed. all weekend for me.  As far as the Compton s go they ve been a little off on
messages.messageBody:
Hi Milt! Sorry I won't see you this show but enjoy yourself. Sedation
cont. ed. all weekend for me. As far as the Compton's go they've been
a little off on Ebay recently but I'd say depending on condition
between $300 and $500 for the set. Later!
Pete Klein
Ft. Lauderdale

messages.subject: Christie's Compton auction catalog
messages.msgSnippet: gang, anyone has any idea as to the retail value of the complete Christie s Compton auction catalogs ( 3 vol ) ? Info from any political persuasion
messages.messageBody:
gang,
anyone has any idea as to the retail value of the complete Christie's
Compton auction catalogs ( 3 vol ) ?
Info from any political persuasion welcome...........

damn, those fresking E. Coast colleges are expensive !!
p.s. nein, the set will not be split, so don't ask.

milt
